name: Sanctifying Elixir
description:
A material that is consumed when defining Artifacts with the Artifact Transmuter.
Artifacts are themselves the crystallized physical manifestation of ideals and memories. This is one of the applications of the noble art of Alchemy â€” namely, to preserve ideals by crystallizing them inside the essence of material objects. Only in this way can they be molded according to need.
sources: Obtained from making offerings to the Tablet of Tona
Obtained from Tribal Secret Spaces in Natlan
